name: Cold Hill (itch)
description:
Cold Hill is a 2D pixel art action platformer game. Find your way through dozens of obstacles, jump precisely, fight enemies. Explore forest, caves and mountains. Help people from the forest and find out the truth about who is the real enemy.



Explore forest, caves and mountains.

Controls are very simple :

A/D for running

Space for jumping

Left Mouse for attacking

Right mouse for dashing

Shift for wall grab
